name: Project Magical Girl - (Prototype)
description:
This game is an early prototype designed to test an exploration experience. Art and mechanics are minimal.

Explore the underground caverns and guide the character to the end. Along the way you will find magical orbs used to unlock new abilities and progress in your journey.

Controls
Move - A/D or Left/Right arrows
Jump - W or Up arrow
Buy Abilities - U
Pause - Esc

Abilities (Locked by default)
Dash - Left Shift or Z
Grapple - Left Ctrl or X
